item.description:
Let’s finish the the summer off with a picnic on the Sound in
Guilford at Chaffinch Park!
Everyone had a great time there, lets close the summer with a
picnic here.

This 22 acre park is a great place for fishing and picnics. The
best parts are that it is beautiful, has tables and grills, a
beach area as well as grass area, is free and parking is fairly
ample.
Everyone can bring a dish to share, such as salads, chips, hot
dogs, burgers, brownies, etc. Please post what you are bringing
when you are RSVP so we don’t all arrive with the same thing

Feel free to bring family, friends and any items that you might
things that you think could add to the fun such as:

• Frisbee
• Badminton/Volleyball equipment
• Cribbage/Cards
• Wiffleball
• Fishing Gear/Crab Nets


The event will be weather dependant!

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Goodbye to summer - Picnic and BBQ at Chaffinch Park
